description: Baseline measurements before the experiment was started,in the gap between the continuous wheat and continuous barley plots. Composite sample of three holes. Soil samples taken with a 15.2 x 15.2 x 22.9cm box sampler
Composite sample of three holes. Soil samples taken with a 15 x 15 x 23cm box sampler
No details given of sampling methods for 1919, assumed to be to 23cm depth
1927 sample cut by spade, 23cm deep, 4-5 holes per plot, soil combined to composite sample
1932 sampled with small semi-cylindrical sampler, 2 independent series per plot, each of 10 holes, soil combined
